Description:
IT Solution Bid Engineer- Kuwait/ Immediate joiner.A. Overview:To manage the writing and production of bids and quotations in response to expressions of Interest (EOIs), Pre-Qualification Questionnaires (PQQs), Invitations to Tender (ITTs) or Request for Proposals (RFPs) from potential customers. This involves leading technical and sales teams to produce winning proposals, and often managing multiple bids simultaneously.
This role requires extensive interaction with sales and technical staff, as well as other support functions. Interaction with partner companies will also be required.B. Accountabilities:Responsible for acting as program officer for all bids and taking responsibility for project completion and handover in liaison with Pre-Sales, Technical, Support, and Sales Members.
Monitor and follow all bids and prepare proposals accordingly.
Prepare and supervise all proposals and templates for sales and account Managers.
Liaise with the concerned departments to get the relevant documents to be incorporated in the Bid.
Design the contents, organization and aesthetics of the bids and proposals.
Compile complete bids with all the relevant information.
Create and maintain a date base of the bids submitted.
Liaison with other departments for day- to-day activities.
Supervise and process any additional assignment given by the Management . Skills
Skills:
At least 1/- year experience of IT ( Software/ hardware) co-ordination role within an office environment.
Experience of reviewing, writing, editing and producing large commercial documents .
Experience of writing, editing and producing sales and marketing material would be desirable, but not essential.
Bachelor degree in Computer , Information Technology, Electronics or equivalent.

Soft skills training.
Proposal writing .
Project costing techniques .
Fluency (verbal / written) in the English and Arabic languages.
Meticulous attention to detail and an appreciation of process and quality.

The role is in Diyar United Company- Kuwait.
The budget for this role is around KWD 300/- KWD 400/-.
Immediate Joiners are preferable.
Arabs nationals only will be contacted.
Male gender is a must.
Fresh graduates with relevant education background can apply.
